section.title: Looking at the result
section.section:
Viewing the Git commit history
The Git operations you performed have created a local Git repository in the .git folder and added all files to this repository via one commit. Run the git log command (See for details).
[source,terminal] ---- include::./examples/gitfirst/gitlog.txt[] ----
You see an output similar to the following. [source,terminal] ---- include::./examples/gitfirst/gitlog-output.txt[] ----

Directory structure
Your directory contains the Git repository as well as the Git working tree for your files. This directory structure is depicted in the following screenshot.
image::images/firstgit-directory10.png[First Git directory] LARSLINEBREAK
